org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.elasticsearch

类 ElasticsearchSinkBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.functions.sink.RichSinkFunction<T>
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.elasticsearch.ElasticsearchSinkBase<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the elements handled by this sink
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, Function, RichFunction, CheckpointedFunction, SinkFunction<T>
    直接已知子类:
    ElasticsearchSink, ElasticsearchSink, ElasticsearchSink

    public abstract class ElasticsearchSinkBase<T>
extends RichSinkFunction<T>
implements CheckpointedFunction
    Base class for all Flink Elasticsearch Sinks.

    This class implements the common behaviour across Elasticsearch versions, such as the use of an internal BulkProcessor to buffer multiple ActionRequests before sending the requests to the cluster, as well as passing input records to the user provided ElasticsearchSinkFunction for processing.

    The version specific API calls for different Elasticsearch versions should be defined by a concrete implementation of a ElasticsearchApiCallBridge, which is provided to the constructor of this class. This call bridge is used, for example, to create a Elasticsearch Client, handle failed item responses, etc.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

        private final ActionRequestFailureHandler failureHandler
        User-provided handler for failed ActionRequests.

      • flushOnCheckpoint

        private boolean flushOnCheckpoint
        If true, the producer will wait until all outstanding action requests have been sent to Elasticsearch.

      • requestIndexer

        private transient BulkProcessorIndexer requestIndexer
        Provided to the user via the ElasticsearchSinkFunction to add ActionRequests.

      • callBridge

        private final ElasticsearchApiCallBridge callBridge
        Call bridge for different version-specific.

      • numPendingRequests

        private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong numPendingRequests
        Number of pending action requests not yet acknowledged by Elasticsearch. This value is maintained only if flushOnCheckpoint is true.

        This is incremented whenever the user adds (or re-adds through the ActionRequestFailureHandler) requests to the RequestIndexer. It is decremented for each completed request of a bulk request, in BulkProcessor.Listener#afterBulk(long, BulkRequest, BulkResponse) and BulkProcessor.Listener#afterBulk(long, BulkRequest, Throwable).

      • client

        private transient org.elasticsearch.client.Client client
        Elasticsearch client created using the call bridge.

      • bulkProcessor

        private transient org.elasticsearch.action.bulk.BulkProcessor bulkProcessor
        Bulk processor to buffer and send requests to Elasticsearch, created using the client.

      • failureThrowable

        private final java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Throwable> failureThrowable
        This is set from inside the BulkProcessor.Listener if a Throwable was thrown in callbacks and the user considered it should fail the sink via the ActionRequestFailureHandler.onFailure(ActionRequest, Throwable, int, RequestIndexer) method.

        Errors will be checked and rethrown before processing each input element, and when the sink is closed.

    • 方法详细资料

      • disableFlushOnCheckpoint

        public void disableFlushOnCheckpoint()
        Disable flushing on checkpoint. When disabled, the sink will not wait for all pending action requests to be acknowledged by Elasticsearch on checkpoints.

        NOTE: If flushing on checkpoint is disabled, the Flink Elasticsearch Sink does NOT provide any strong guarantees for at-least-once delivery of action requests.

      • open

        public void open(Configuration parameters)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: RichFunction
        Initialization method for the function. It is called before the actual working methods (like map or join) and thus suitable for one time setup work. For functions that are part of an iteration, this method will be invoked at the beginning of each iteration superstep.

        The configuration object passed to the function can be used for configuration and initialization. The configuration contains all parameters that were configured on the function in the program composition. 

        
 public class MyMapper extends FilterFunction<String> {
 
     private String searchString;
     
     public void open(Configuration parameters) {
         this.searchString = parameters.getString("foo");
     }
     
     public boolean filter(String value) {
         return value.equals(searchString);
     }
 }

        By default, this method does nothing.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 RichFunction
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 AbstractRichFunction
        参数:
        parameters - The configuration containing the parameters attached to the contract.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Implementations may forward exceptions, which are caught by the runtime. When the runtime catches an exception, it aborts the task and lets the fail-over logic decide whether to retry the task execution.
        另请参阅:
        Configuration

        public void initializeState(FunctionInitializationContext context)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointedFunction
        This method is called when the parallel function instance is created during distributed execution. Functions typically set up their state storing data structures in this method.

      • snapshotState

        public void snapshotState(FunctionSnapshotContext context)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointedFunction
        This method is called when a snapshot for a checkpoint is requested. This acts as a hook to the function to ensure that all state is exposed by means previously offered through FunctionInitializationContext when the Function was initialized, or offered now by FunctionSnapshotContext itself.
        指定者:
        snapshotState 在接口中 CheckpointedFunction
        参数:
        context - the context for drawing a snapshot of the operator
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: RichFunction
        Tear-down method for the user code. It is called after the last call to the main working methods (e.g. map or join). For functions that are part of an iteration, this method will be invoked after each iteration superstep.

        This method can be used for clean up work.

        指定者:
        close 在接口中 RichFunction
        覆盖:
        close 在类中 AbstractRichFunction
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Implementations may forward exceptions, which are caught by the runtime. When the runtime catches an exception, it aborts the task and lets the fail-over logic decide whether to retry the task execution.
